languages.text: {n}Ваши слова заставляют многие взгляды вспыхнуть, но даже среди накачанных стимуляторами гладиаторов нет дураков, чтобы перечить вам.{/n}
{n}Your words cause some eyes to flash with anger, but there is no one foolish enough to oppose you even among these gladiators pumped full of stimulants.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши слова заставляют многие взгляды вспыхнуть, но даже среди накачанных стимуляторами гладиаторов нет дураков, чтобы перечить вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words cause some eyes to flash with anger, but there is no one foolish enough to oppose you even among these gladiators pumped with stimulants.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words cause some eyes to flash with anger, but there is no one foolish enough to oppose you even among these gladiators pumped full of stimulants.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉に怒りの目を向ける者もいるが、興奮剤をたっぷり打った剣闘士たちの中にも、あなたに逆らうような愚かな者はひとりもいない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words cause some eyes to flash with anger, but there is no one foolish enough to oppose you even among these gladiators pumped full of stimulants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉に怒りの目を向ける者もいるが、興奮剤をたっぷり打った剣闘士たちの中にも、あなたに逆らうような愚かな者はひとりもいない。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}你的话让一部分人眼神中充满怒火，但即便是这些打了兴奋剂的角斗士，也没有人愚蠢到胆敢反对你的命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words cause some eyes to flash with anger, but there is no one foolish enough to oppose you even among these gladiators pumped full of stimulants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话让一部分人眼神中充满怒火，但即便是这些打了兴奋剂的角斗士，也没有人愚蠢到胆敢反对你的命令。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras hacen que algunos ojos se incendien de ira, pero no hay nadie tan necio como para oponerse a ti, ni siquiera entre los gladiadores llenos de estimulantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words cause some eyes to flash with anger, but there is no one foolish enough to oppose you even among these gladiators pumped full of stimulants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras hacen que algunos ojos se incendien de ira, pero no hay nadie tan necio como para oponerse a ti, ni siquiera entre los gladiadores llenos de estimulantes.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Bei deinen Worten blitzen einige Augen zornig auf, doch nicht einmal unter diesen mit Stimulanzien vollgepumpten Gladiatoren ist jemand so töricht, sich dir zu widersetzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words cause some eyes to flash with anger, but there is no one foolish enough to oppose you even among these gladiators pumped full of stimulants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei deinen Worten blitzen einige Augen zornig auf, doch nicht einmal unter diesen mit Stimulanzien vollgepumpten Gladiatoren ist jemand so töricht, sich dir zu widersetzen.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Vous voyez les yeux des gladiateurs brûler de colère, mais aucun n'est assez stupide pour s'opposer à vous, même parmi ceux qui sont gonflés aux stimulants.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words cause some eyes to flash with anger, but there is no one foolish enough to oppose you even among these gladiators pumped full of stimulants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous voyez les yeux des gladiateurs brûler de colère, mais aucun n'est assez stupide pour s'opposer à vous, même parmi ceux qui sont gonflés aux stimulants.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin yüzünden bazı gözler öfkeyle doluyor. Yine de uyarıcıya gömülmüş bu gladyatörler bile sana kafa tutacak kadar aptal değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words cause some eyes to flash with anger, but there is no one foolish enough to oppose you even among these gladiators pumped full of stimulants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Söylediklerin yüzünden bazı gözler öfkeyle dolsa da, uyarıcılarla dolu bu gladyatörler bile sana kafa tutacak kadar aptal değil.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariRanger_Ranged_Prison
